intro: Merge, strategize, and conquer—reach 2048 in this addictive puzzle phenomenon!
description: Immerse yourself in this addictive puzzle game where strategy is key! Merge colorful cubes with matching numbers to create higher-value cubes, like combining two 2s to make a 4, and so on. Your goal is to score as high as possible while keeping the board clear. If more than 20 cubes fill the board, it’s game over. Can you master the art of merging, reach the coveted 2048 cube, or achieve an unbeatable score?
